Download Tridentu 2 (1.5)

Tridentu 2 CT-1.5

The smallest (feature-wise) variant of the Tridentu 2 Linux distro, this variant contains only what is needed for Tridentu 2 to be itself.

  • Size: 2.4 GB
  • User Interface: Linux Console only
  • Supported Firmware: UEFI Only
  • Checksum (SHA256): Download
  • Signature File: Download
Verify
gpg --verify SHA256SUMS-CT-1.5.asc SHA256SUMS-CT-1.5 
sha256sum -c SHA256SUMS-CT-1.5
DOWNLOAD THE ISO
